meanings.definition: Persons aged between 13 and 19 years old.
meanings.sent1: Teenagers enjoy spending time with their friends after school.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of teenagers playing basketball at the park.
meanings.sent3: The teenagers giggled as they tried to fit too many people in the small car.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of possibilities, teenagers are like budding flowers waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The energy and enthusiasm of teenagers can light up any room.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals in their teenage years.
meanings.sent1: The teenagers gathered around the bonfire, sharing stories and laughter.
meanings.sent2: I noticed a group of teenagers walking home from school together.
meanings.sent3: The teenagers decided to have a spontaneous dance party in the park.
meanings.sent4: Among the crowd of teenagers, she stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The bond between teenagers can be as strong as steel, unbreakable and resilient.
